meanings.definition: In the sixth place or order.
meanings.sent1: Sixthly, we will discuss the final point of the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The team member presented their ideas sixthly during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to nap sixthly on the highest shelf in the closet.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, sixthly filling the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun set sixthly behind the mountains, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: As the sixth item in a list or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The sixthly item on the menu was the chef's special pasta dish.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the sixthly book back on the shelf in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent3: The sixthly cupcake in the display looked too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: His sixthly attempt at solving the puzzle finally led to success.
meanings.sent5: The sixthly flower in the garden bloomed with vibrant colors, standing out among the rest.
